summary: An ordinance relating to, and providing for the condemnation of certain lands, property, property rights and privileges for the purpose of improving Lenora Street and Lenora Street produced, from the west margin of Railroad Avenue to the west margin of Armory Way, as established by Ordinance No. 57733, by the construction of a bridge or overhead viaduct, and approaches thereto, as contemplated by Ordinance No. 59130.
